PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^7^7^xD02090^xB97123^xE05030^x70FF70^xD02090^x70FF70------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ^xFFFF77^xD02090^xFFFF77^xE05030IMPORTANT THINGS TO NOTE ABOUT THIS POB^7 ^7^x70FF70------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ^71. ^xADAA47^x7070FFArcane Surge^7 in the boots gem links (linked with ^x7070FFarcanist brand^7 and ^x7070FFwave of conviction^7) is just to simulate damage. Pob does not count the arcane surge buff we get with the our large cluster jewelm, so this is a way to manually add it in. You do not need to socket it. 2. I get "19% increased effect of marks" and "call to arms" keystone on my sanctified relic. Increased mark effect allows my ^x70FF70snipers mark^7 split into 11 ^x7070FFfireballs^7, instread of 10 pushing our total fireball count from 15 to 16. But its fine if you don't have it, or if you have something else like spell crit multi, flat spell fire damage, etc. Call to arms is to make our ^xE05030enduring cry^7 instant - remember to use it. 3. You can either have ^xE05030enduring cry^7 on your left mounse button and^xE05030 immortal call^7 on a button you manually press when you're in trouble, or the other way around. Just remember that having either endurance charges or^xE05030 immortal call^7 up makes this build a lot tankier. ^7^7^7 ^x70FF70------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- HOW TO GET THE BUILD UP AND RUNNING^7^7: ^7BARE-BONES VERSION^7
^x70FF70-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------^7 ^xD02090^xFFFF77APPROXIMATE PRICE BREAKDOWN^7^7^7^7^7 (of the bare-bones^7^7 version^xC8C8C8, ^7 price^7 ^7^7before the release of video): ^xFFFF77d^7 stands for divine orbs, ^xFFFF77c^7 stands for chao orbs, 1 divine = 250 chaos. ^x70FF70------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ^7 ^xFFFF77^xC8C8C8^x70FF70^7^x70FF70TOTAL COST ^7(to get the bare-bones version up and running) : ^7 ^xFFFF77130.5 d
^x70FF70Gear^7 Total^7^7^7^7^7^7^7 -^xFFFF77^xFFFF77 65.5^7 ^xFFFF77d ^x70FF70 ------------------------- ^xAF6025Ring1^7: Nimis^7 Topaz^7 Ring^7^x7070FF ^7-^xADAA47 ^xFFFF7730 d ^7 ^7 ^xE05030Note:^7 Buy the lowest dex roll in your price range ^xFFFF77Ring2^7^7: rare ring - ^xADAA47^xFFFF771 d^7^7 ^xAF6025Amulet^7: Leadership's Price with 2%+ max lightning res and ^71%+ for fire /cold res - ^xADAA472 d^7 ^xFFFF77Weapon^7: dagger - ^xADAA47^xFFFF772d ^7^7 ^xFFFF77Shield^7: ^xADAA47^7^xFFFF7713 d^7 for 2% all max res fractured base^7 ^xADAA47^7+^7^xADAA47^xFFFF77 0.5 d^7^7^7 to craft for the most basic version - ^xADAA47^xFFFF7713.5 d^7^7 (or as low as ^xFFFF772 d^7 if you want the very bare-minium usable version, see below) ^xFFFF77Helmet^7: ^xADAA47^7rare crafted helmet -^7^xFFFF77 3 d^7^7^xADAA47 ^xFFFF77Gloves^7^7: rare crafted gloves -^xFFFF77^xADAA47 ^xFFFF773 d^7^7^7 ^xFFFF77Boots^7: rare crafted boots -^xFFFF77^xADAA47 ^xFFFF774 d^7^7^7 ^xAF6025Body^7 (6L LIghtning coil): -^xFFFF77 1 d^7 ^xFFFF77Belt^7: rare crafted belt -^xADAA47 ^xFFFF774 d^7^7 ^x8888FFWell rolled flasks^7 -^xFFFF77 2 d^7
^x70FF70Jewels and Cluster Jewels ^7Total^7^7 -^xFFFF77 54.8 d ^x70FF70---------------------------------------------------^7 ^xAF6025Focal point forbidden couple jewels: ^7- ^xFFFF7740 d^7 4x ^xFFFF77Medium cluster jewels^7: about 60c each - ^xFFFF771 d^7 2x ^xFFFF77large cluster jewels^7, about 2 d each - ^xFFFF774 d^7 3x ^xAF6025grand spectrum jewels^7, (power charge ^xFFFF771.8 d^7, crit chance ^xFFFF7730 c^7, elemental damage^xFFFF77 2.2 d^7 ) - ^xFFFF774.1^7^xFFFF77 d^7 ^xAF6025Life on hit vitality watchers eye^7 - ^xFFFF772.5 d^7 ^xFFFF77rare crit multi + attack speed jewel^7 - ^xFFFF77^7(^7^xFFFF7750 c^7^7)^7 ^xFFFF770.2 d^7^7 ^xB97123^xAF6025Militant faith^7 (dominus with reduced mana cost + elemental damage or area damage) - ^xFFFF773 d^7 ^xE05030 Note:^7 make sure to check that the timeless jewel you bought doesnt change any notables on your tree
^x70FF70^x3F6DB3^x70FF70Notable and expensive skill gems:^7^7^x70FF70 ^7Total - ^xFFFF7710.2 d^7 ^x70FF70------------------------------------------------------------- level 5^x70FF70 awakened cast on crit ^7- ^xFFFF771 d ^7 level 3 ^x8888FFenlightened^7 + level 3 ^x70FF70enhanced^7 + 21/20 ^x70FF70^x7070FFfireball^7^7 + 21/0 grace + 21/0 ^x8888FFzealotry^7 + ^x8888FFanomalous flammability ^7+ 21/20 ^x70FF70snipers mark^7 + 20/23 ^xE05030Herald of Ash^7 + 21/20 ^x8888FFFlame wall^7 - ^xFFFF772 d^7 ^xE05030Anomalous Blood and sand ^7-^7 ^xFFFF771 d^7 ^xE05030Divergent Inspiration^7 - ^xFFFF774 d^7 ^7^xE05030Lvl 4 Empower^7 - ^xFFFF774.2 d^7
^x70FF70------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ^xFFFF77^xD02090^xFFFF77HOW TO BUY OR CRAFT THE RARE GEAR^7^7^7 ^7^x70FF70-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------^7
^xC8C8C8^7^xFFFF77Ring:^7 ^7 Purchase a generic ring with ^xD02090chaos res^7, ^xD02090^xE05030life^7^7,^x8888FF mana^7, around 20% ele res, and open suffix to bench craft^x8888FF +1 min power charge^7
^xFFFF77Weapon^7: ^xAF6025How to craft^7: 1. purchase a fractured + 1 all skill gem or ^xE05030+ 1 fire skill gem^7 imperial skean rune dagger 2. Use attack speed essence and roll for crit chance. The only requirement is 29+% increased attack speed and 30%+ increased critical strike chance. 3. Harvest enchant it with increased attack speed per quality. 4. Bench craft "^x8888FFhits cant be evaded^7" 5. Harvest enchant this weapon with either "^6increased attack speed per quality" ^7or "^x8888FF^6increased critical strike chance per quality^7^7" depending on what you're missing.
^xFFFF77Shield^7: ^xADAA47 ^xAF6025How to craft: ^7(expensive version) 1. Purchase any ^x7070FFint^7 shield base (dont buy bone spirit shield) with 2% all max res mod factured 2. Use metallic + scorched fossils to hit +3% to maximum Fire/Cold/Lightning Res, 1 in 20 tries 3. If you hit fire or cold max res, use harvest "change resistance" craft to change it to lightning 4. Bench craft life. Your end product should have^x8888FF^7:^7 ^x8888FFbench crafted life^7^7, ^xAF6025^xE050302% all max res^7^7, ^7^7^xFFFF773% to maximum Lightning Res^7
^xAF6025How to craft:^7 ^7(cheaper version) 1. Purchase any ^x7070FFint^7 shield base (dont buy bone spirit shield) with 3% lightning res mod factured 2. Chaos spam until you have +2% all max res mod (400-500 c average) 3. Bench craft life. Your end product should have^x8888FF^7:^7 ^x8888FFbench crafted life^7^7, ^xAF6025^xE050302% all max res^7^7, ^7^7^xFFFF773% to maximum Lightning Res^7
^xAF6025How to craft:^7 ^7(bare minimum version) 1. Buy any shield base with ^xAF6025^xE050302% all max res^7^7, ^7^7^xFFFF773% to maximum Lightning Res^7, and 1 empty prefix. Should cost you under 2 divines. 2. Bench craft life. 3. Your end product should have^x8888FF^7:^7 ^x8888FFbench crafted life^7^7, ^xAF6025^xE050302% all max res^7^7, ^7^7^xFFFF773% to maximum Lightning Res^7
^xFFFF77Helmet^7: ^xADAA47^7 ^xAF6025How to craft:^7 1. Get a pure evasion or evasion + es hybrid helmet base with our sniper's mark enchant 2. Use essences to get ^xD02090chaos res^7,^xE05030 life^7, around ^x70FF7010% spell suppress^7^x70FF70ion^7, and an open prefix 3. Finish implicits with eldritch ichor and amber, the necessary one is "physical damage from hits taken as lightning" 4. Bench craft "physical damage from hits taken as fire" 5. Your end product should have: ^xD02090chaos res^7^7,^xE05030 life^7, around ^x70FF7010% spell suppress^7,^x8888FF bench crafted^7 ^x8888FF"physical damage from hits taken as fire"^7
^xFFFF77Gloves^7: ^xAF6025How to craft:^7 1. Buy a pure evasion or evasion + es hybrid glove base with either fractured ^xE05030life^7, or fractured ^x70FF70spell suppression^7 2. Use strength essences until you have all these mods: ^x70FF7010%+ spell suppress^7^x70FF70ion^7, ^xE05030life ^7and an open suffix 3. Bench Craft^x8888FF attack speed^7. 4. Finish implicits with eldritch ichor and amber. The "unnerve" mod can be the lowest tier, but try to get above 20% "increased effect of marks". Not a priority, but you'd be missing lots of damage. 5. Your end product should have:^xE05030 life^7^xD02090^7,^7 ^7around^7 ^x70FF7010% spell suppress^7,^x8888FF bench crafted^7 ^x8888FFattack speed^7^7
^xFFFF77Belt^7: ^xAF6025How to craft:^7^7 1. Buy level 86+ stygian vise with unnerve enchant 2. Try and roll^xD02090 chaos res^7^7^7, tier 2 + ^x70FF70"increased flask charges gained^7^x70FF70"^7 mod, and an empty suffix. You can use essence, chaos spam, or alteration + regal orbs. Using chaos resist essence would be the fastest, using alt + regal would be the cheapest method. 3. Bench craft ^x8888FF"can have up to 3 crafted mods" ^7 and use Wild Bristle Matron beast to apply ^7^x8888FF"suffixes cannot be changed"^7. 4. Veiled chaos orb, ^x8888FF^7benchcraft ^7^x8888FFmana^7, ^7try to unveil ^xE05030life^7 or "chance for Flasks you use to not consume Charges". Getting one of these two is almost guaranteed (pick life over flask if both mods show up) 5.^x8888FF ^7Benchcraft^7 ^x8888FF12% increased cooldown recovery rate^7 6. Your end product should have:^xE05030 ^xD02090chaos res^7^7^7^7,^x8888FF ^x70FF7030% + increased flask charges gained^7^x70FF70^7, ^x8888FF12% increased cooldown recovery rate^7 , ^xE05030life^7 (or chance for flasks you use to not consume charges)
^xFFFF77Boots^7: ^xB97123How to craft:^7^7^7 1. Buy or craft boots with ^x70FF7025%+ Movment Speed^7, ^xD02090chaos res^7^7^7,^xE05030 life^7, and around ^x70FF70^x70FF7010% spell ^7^x70FF70suppression^7 2. ^x70FF70^7Finish implicits with eldritch ichor and amber. ^7Total cooldown recovery rate from your gear must add up to 21% (boots + belt + jewel) . Aim for as high action speed as possible. 3. Enchant with "avoid stun if you've killed recently"
^xFFFF77Abyss Jewel: ^7 Buy an abyss jewel with ^xE05030life^7 and ^xADAA47stun avoidance^7. For the rest of the mods, you can look for whatever stats you may need. For example: 1. You can look for ^x7070FFintelligence^7 if you need more int to balance your stats for ^xAF6025leadership's price^7 2. You can look for ^x8888FFcooldown recovery rate^7 if you are not yet at 21% 3. You can get resists / ^xD02090chaos resist^7 if you are struggling to cap resistances 4. You can get crit chance to cap your ^x70FF70cyclone^7 critical strike chance 5. You can look for attack speed if you are missing attack speed ( aim to get close to but not over 10.1 ^x70FF70cyclone^7 attack rate) 6. You can get spell fire damage, critical strike multiplier, elemental penetration, etc if you don't need any other stats and just want damage
^x70FF70-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------^7 ^xFFFF77THINGS TO CHECK AFTER PUTTING TOGETHER THE BUILD ^7^x70FF70-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------^7
^x70FF701. Is the your cyclone attack speed close to but not over 10.1?^7 IF above 10.1, lower your attack speed! IF lower than 9.8, get more attack speed!
^x70FF702. Is your cyclone crit chance above 95%? ^7 If not, get more attack or global crit chance!
^x70FF704. Is your fire ball trigger rate above 9? ^7 If it's only at around 5, you need more cooldown recovery !
^x70FF705. Is your dexterity equal to your ^x7070FFintelligence^7 ^x70FF70?^7 ^7 Use your cluster jewel suffix and your jewel/abyss jewel to balance your ^x8888FFint^7 and ^x70FF70dex^7 to be equal.
^x70FF706. Are your elemental resistances capped? ^7 Make sure they are capped.
^7^7
